job.title: Data Specialist
job.description: Manages the organizational client tracking database Ensures timely data input and quality Prioritizes inbound technical assistance training configuration and reporting work requests Works with program staff and leadership to consult advise and perform various adhoc and projectbased content developmentbuild data analysis and reports This includes both routine data review and reporting and customized adhoc and business intelligenceoriented work Must maintain an updated understanding of required softwareltbrgtltbrgtA nonprofit organization with daily interaction with client customers including individuals who have barriers to employment Must work with diverse populations and be able to give highquality customer serviceltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtRequiredltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt Knowledge of SharePoint tools like ULS Logs workflows to automate business processes and SharePoint forms for tasks and document storageltligtltligt Advanced Excelltligtltligt Database structure knowledge especially Caseworthyltligtltligt Some SQL preferredltbrgtltligtltulgt
